title: How to Download Yandere Simulator

steps.headline: Go to http://yanderesimulator.com in a web browser.
steps.description: This is the official website of Yandere Simulator hosted by the developers. The official version of the game is not yet released, but a 2020 or 2021 release is likely. Some antivirus apps may mark Yandere Simulator as a virus because the application isn't signed by the developer. As long as you download an official copy of the installer you should be okay. The only place you should download Yandere Simulator from is https://dl.yanderesimulator.com/latest.zip or https://yanderedev.wordpress.com/downloads. Always use your best judgment before installing any apps you download from the internet.

steps.headline: Click the Download tab.
steps.description: It's near the top-center part of the page.

steps.headline: Scroll down and click Download Launcher.
steps.description: It's a pink button near the middle of the page. This downloads the launcher to your computer. You may have to click Save to start the download.

steps.headline: Click the downloaded file.
steps.description: It should be in your default downloads folder, which is usually called Downloads.

steps.headline: Click Yes on the security message.
steps.description: This opens the Yandere Simulator launcher, which will download the files necessary to start playing the test version of the game.

steps.headline: Click Play when the download is complete.
steps.description: You can watch the progress of the download at the bottom-center part of the window. Once the files are completely downloaded, clicking Play will launch the game.

text: Go to http://yanderesimulator.com in a web browser. This is the official website of Yandere Simulator hosted by the developers. The official version of the game is not yet released, but a 2020 or 2021 release is likely. Some antivirus apps may mark Yandere Simulator as a virus because the application isn't signed by the developer. As long as you download an official copy of the installer you should be okay. The only place you should download Yandere Simulator from is https://dl.yanderesimulator.com/latest.zip or https://yanderedev.wordpress.com/downloads. Always use your best judgment before installing any apps you download from the internet. Click the Download tab. It's near the top-center part of the page. Scroll down and click Download Launcher. It's a pink button near the middle of the page. This downloads the launcher to your computer. You may have to click Save to start the download. Click the downloaded file. It should be in your default downloads folder, which is usually called Downloads. Click Yes on the security message. This opens the Yandere Simulator launcher, which will download the files necessary to start playing the test version of the game. Click Play when the download is complete. You can watch the progress of the download at the bottom-center part of the window. Once the files are completely downloaded, clicking Play will launch the game.
